verses.verse: Am<WG1510> I not an apostle?<WG652> am<WG1510> I not free?<WG1658> have I not seen<WG3708> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> our Lord?<WG2962> are not you my work<WG2041> in the Lord?<WG2962>
If<WG1487> I be not an apostle<WG652> to others,<WG243> yet<WG235> doubtless<WG1065> I am<WG1510> to you: for the seal<WG4973> of my<WG1699> apostleship<WG651> are you in the Lord.<WG2962>
My<WG1699> answer<WG627> to them that do examine<WG350> me is this,<WG3778>
Have<WG2192> we not power<WG1849> to eat<WG5315> and to drink?<WG4095>

Have<WG2192> we not power<WG1849> to lead<WG4013> about<WG4013> a sister,<WG79> a wife,<WG1135> as well<WG2532> as other<WG3062> apostles,<WG652> and as the brothers<WG80> of the Lord,<WG2962> and Cephas?<WG2786>
Or<WG2228> I only<WG3441> and Barnabas,<WG921> have<WG2192> not we power<WG1849> to forbear<WG3361> working?<WG2038>

Who<WG5100> goes a warfare<WG4754> any<WG4218> time<WG4218> at<WG4218> his own<WG2398> charges?<WG3800> who<WG5100> plants<WG5452> a vineyard,<WG290> and eats<WG2068> not of the fruit<WG2590> thereof?<WG846> or<WG2228> who<WG5100> feeds<WG4165> a flock,<WG4167> and eats<WG2068> not of the milk<WG1051> of the flock?<WG4167>
Say<WG2980> I these<WG5023> things as a man?<WG444> or<WG2228> said<WG3004> not the law<WG3551> the same<WG5023> also?<WG2532>

For it is written<WG1125> in the law<WG3551> of Moses,<WG3475> You shall not muzzle<WG5392> the mouth of the ox<WG1016> that treads<WG248> out the corn. Does God<WG2316> take care<WG3199> for oxen?<WG1016>

Or<WG2228> said<WG3004> he it altogether<WG3843> for our sakes? For our sakes, no<WG1063> doubt,<WG1063> this is written:<WG1125> that he that plows<WG722> should<WG3784> plow<WG722> in hope;<WG1680> and that he that threshes<WG248> in hope<WG1680> should be partaker<WG3348> of his hope.<WG1680>
If<WG1487> we have<WG2192> sown<WG4687> to you spiritual<WG4152> things, is it a great<WG3173> thing if<WG1487> we shall reap<WG2325> your<WG5216> carnal<WG4559> things?

If<WG1487> others<WG243> be partakers<WG3348> of this<WG3588> power<WG1849> over you, are not we rather?<WG3123> Nevertheless<WG235> we have<WG2192> not used<WG5530> this<WG5026> power;<WG1849> but suffer<WG4722> all<WG3956> things, lest<WG2443> <WG3361> we should hinder<WG5100> the gospel<WG2098> of Christ.<WG5547>

Do you not know<WG1492> that they which minister<WG2038> about holy<WG2413> things live<WG2068> of the things of the temple?<WG2411> and they which wait<WG4332> at the altar<WG2379> are partakers<WG4829> with the altar?<WG2379>
Even<WG2532> so<WG3779> has the Lord<WG2962> ordained<WG1299> that they which preach<WG2605> the gospel<WG2098> should live<WG2198> of the gospel.<WG2098>

But I have used<WG5530> none<WG3762> of these<WG5130> things: neither have I written<WG1125> these<WG5023> things, that it should be so<WG3779> done<WG1096> to me: for it were better<WG2570> <WG3123> for me to die,<WG599> than<WG2228> that any<WG5100> man should make<WG2758> my glorying<WG2745> void.<WG2758>

For though<WG1437> I preach<WG2097> the gospel,<WG2097> I have<WG2076> nothing<WG3756> to glory<WG2745> of: for necessity<WG318> is laid<WG1945> on me; yes,<WG1161> woe<WG3759> is to me, if<WG1437> I preach<WG2097> not the gospel!<WG2097>

For if<WG1487> I do<WG4238> this<WG5124> thing willingly,<WG1635> I have<WG2192> a reward:<WG3408> but if<WG1487> against<WG210> my will,<WG210> a dispensation<WG3622> of the gospel is committed<WG4100> to me.

What<WG5101> is my reward<WG3408> then?<WG3767> Truly that, when I preach<WG2097> the gospel,<WG2097> I may make<WG5087> the gospel<WG2098> of Christ<WG5547> without<WG77> charge,<WG77> that I abuse<WG2710> not my power<WG1849> in the gospel.<WG2098>
For though I be free<WG1658> from all<WG3956> men, yet have<WG2192> I made<WG1402> myself<WG1683> servant<WG1402> to all,<WG3956> that I might gain<WG2770> the more.<WG4119>

And to the Jews<WG2453> I became<WG1096> as a Jew,<WG2453> that I might gain<WG2770> the Jews;<WG2453> to them that are under<WG5259> the law,<WG3551> as under<WG5259> the law,<WG3551> that I might gain<WG2770> them that are under<WG5259> the law;<WG3551>

To them that are without<WG459> law,<WG459> as without<WG459> law,<WG459> (being<WG5607> not without<WG459> law<WG459> to God,<WG2316> but under<WG1772> the law<WG1772> to Christ,<WG5547>) that I might gain<WG2770> them that are without<WG459> law.<WG459>

To the weak<WG770> became<WG1096> I as weak,<WG770> that I might gain<WG2770> the weak:<WG770> I am made<WG1096> all<WG3956> things to all<WG3956> men, that I might by all<WG3956> means<WG3843> save<WG4982> some.<WG5100>
And this<WG5124> I do<WG4160> for the gospel's<WG2098> sake, that I might be partaker<WG4791> thereof<WG846> with you.
Know<WG1492> you not that they which run<WG5143> in a race<WG4712> run<WG5143> all,<WG3956> but one<WG1520> receives<WG2983> the prize?<WG1017> So<WG3779> run,<WG5143> that you may obtain.<WG2638>

And every<WG3956> man that strives<WG75> for the mastery is temperate<WG1467> in all<WG3956> things. Now<WG3303> they do it to obtain<WG2983> a corruptible<WG5349> crown;<WG4735> but we an incorruptible.<WG862>
I therefore<WG5106> so<WG3779> run,<WG5143> not as uncertainly;<WG84> so<WG3779> fight<WG4438> I, not as one that beats<WG1194> the air:<WG109>

But I keep<WG5299> under<WG5299> my body,<WG4983> and bring<WG1396> it into subjection:<WG1396> lest<WG3381> that by any<WG3381> means,<WG4458> when I have preached<WG2784> to others,<WG243> I myself should be a castaway.<WG96>
